CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Lead__c == null , Opportunity__c == null ,Account__c != null ) , Account__r.Mobile_No__c , IF(Lead__r.IsConverted == true, Opportunity__r.Account.Mobile_No__c , IF( Opportunity__c != null, Opportunity__r.Account.Mobile_No__c , Lead__r.RW_Mobile_No__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Mobile No
